/**
 * \page page_dummywriter Dummy Writer
 *
 * Implements an example program to create a DAT File with two streams.
 * Remember to run this example on windows the streaming lib dll must be in yout path.
 * 
 * \par Location
 * \code
 *    ./examples/dummywriter/
 * \endcode
 *
 * \par This example shows:
 * \li how to create and release a IADTFFileWriter
 * \li how to create a DAT File with basic sample type
 * 
 * \par The Implementation for the Dummy Writer
 * \include dummywriter.cpp
 *
 */
